tests.name: Hello World Test
tests.setup: sudo -H pip3 install pytest fastapi httpx

tests.name: Uno nunca sabe
tests.run: echo " from fastapi.testclient import TestClient import pytest from homework import app  client = TestClient(app)  def test_read_root():     response = client.get('/')     assert response.status_code == 200     assert response.json() == {'Hello': 'World'}  def test_read_item():     response = client.get('/items/5')     assert response.status_code == 200     assert response.json() == {'item_id': 5}  # Ejecutar pruebas test_read_root() test_read_item() " | python
